comment: The Grave of a Pagan Bishop in the ruins of Coventry Cathedral. Oddly enough, it is pretty much the only thing that survived after the Luftwaffe bombed it in WW2.
amr:
# ::snt The Grave of a Pagan Bishop in the ruins of Coventry Cathedral. Oddly enough, it is pretty much the only thing that survived after the Luftwaffe bombed it in WW2.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (g / grave
                  :poss (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (b2 / bishop))
                        :mod (r / religious-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Pagan"))))
            :ARG2 (r2 / ruin-01
                  :ARG1 (b3 / building
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Coventry"
                              :op2 "Church"))))
      :snt2 (s / survive-01
            :ARG0 (ii / it)
            :mod (o / only
                  :degree (p2 / pretty-much))
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (b4 / bomb-01
                        :ARG0 (m2 / military
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Luftwaffe"))
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :time (w / war
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "WW2"))))
            :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG3 (e / enough))
            :ARG1-of h2))

comment: Can we maybe say the word we actually mean instead of equating beign gay with being stupid/terrible/whatever else you're going for?
